author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Marcus & Millichap Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.22
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Marcus & Millichap Inc:
* MARCUS & MILLICHAP, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 * Q4 REVENUE $202.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $189.1 MILLION
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.52 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍RESULTS INCLUDE A ONE-TIME TAX CHARGE​
* QTRLY ‍NET INCOME INCLUDED A $11.6 MILLION ONE- TIME CHARGE IN CONNECTION WITH REMEASUREMENT OF DEFERRED TAX ASSETS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
